channel.title: Gwt Celltable on Codetab

item.title: CellTable - GWT Tutorial - CodeTab
item.description: 6.7.Â FactTable This section uses GWT CellTable to display the data in a table. FactTable displays facts of a category for a specific date. FactTable may be nested within another FactTable, and inner FactTable can display facts of another category. Figure shows a nested FactTable where outer FactTable shows Facts as on Mar 2012 for category PL and inner FactTable displays Facts for category Cash Flow. On load, Snapshot displays Facts for the latest available date for each category.
